Search4word extension includes a web search function within the new tab, results by Microsoft Bing.

Please note that the search functions within Search4word are provided exclusively by Microsoft Bing. By clicking "add to Chrome," you agree to install the Search4word extension and set the Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as outlined in the service's Terms of Use and Policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for using Search4word!
